opinions.snippet:
GOLDBERG, Circuit Judge, dissenting:
I respectfully dissent. My brethren view too narrowly the scope of the duty imposed on McNeil to provide “adequate warnings” with inherently unsafe prescription drugs. Settled law holds McNeil liable for the harm the drugs actually and proximately cause if no “learned intermediary” intervenes or if McNeil knows that the drugs will be utilized i
